Body:
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternUniform(normalization=1.0, regions=[(0, 2, 1,
    4), (3, 5, 1, 4)])
image = np.array([[0.0, 1.0, 2.0, 2.0, 2.0], [0.0, 1.0, 3.0, 3.0, 3.0], [
    0.0, 1.0, 4.0, 4.0, 4.0], [0.0, 1.0, 5.0, 5.0, 5.0], [0.0, 1.0, 6.0, 
    6.0, 6.0]])
frame = ci_frame.ChInj(frame_geometry=ci_frame.FrameGeometry.
    euclid_bottom_right(), ci_pattern=pattern)
serial_frame = frame.serial_calibration_section_for_rows(image, rows=(1, 2))
assert (serial_frame == np.array([[0.0, 1.0, 3.0, 3.0, 3.0], [0.0, 1.0, 6.0,
    6.0, 6.0]])).all()
